scenario_analysis.client_needs_summary: Beta Corp requests a 2-day Effective Communication Skills training for 18 junior managers, to be conducted on-site at their offices in TechCity during first half of September 2024 (preferred dates Sep 9-10 or Sep 11-12). Their budget is approximately $4,500. Training should cover email/report writing, active listening, and constructive disagreement management.
potential_issues_or_deviations: Client budget ($4,500) is below the calculated minimum fee ($7,302.50) based on standard rates for 18 participants including large group surcharge.
Client preferred dates (Sep 9-10 or Sep 11-12) conflict with trainer unavailability (Section 4: Sep 9-13 booked).
Requested participant number (18) exceeds standard maximum (15) and triggers Large Group Surcharge of 15% (Section 2).
On-site location (TechCity) requires additional travel cost of $400 (Section 3).

negotiation_points.details: Client budget ($4,500) vs. Calculated standard fee ($7,302.50 including surcharge) plus travel costs ($400).
Client preferred dates (Sep 9-12) unavailable due to trainer schedule.
Client request (18 participants) exceeds standard maximum (15) requiring surcharge.
On-site training in TechCity requires additional travel expenses.

proposed_terms.proposal: Propose total training fee of $7,302.50 (includes base fee + 15% surcharge). Separately state travel cost of $400. Total package: $7,702.50.
proposed_terms.supporting_data_reference: Based on Section 2: Facilitator Daily Rate ($2500/day) * 2 days = $5000 + Digital Materials Fee ($75/participant) * 18 participants = $1350. Subtotal: $6350. Large Group Surcharge (15% of $6350) = $952.50. Total training fee: $7302.50. Travel cost based on Section 3: Standard Travel Cost Estimate (TechCity) $400.

proposed_terms.proposal: Proposed alternative dates: 2024-09-16 to 2024-09-17 or 2024-09-23 to 2024-09-24.
proposed_terms.supporting_data_reference: Based on Section 4: Trainer Availability shows Dr. Alex Reed is available on Sep 16-17 and Sep 23-24.

proposed_terms.proposal: Accept 18 participants with 15% surcharge applied to standard fee.
proposed_terms.supporting_data_reference: Based on Section 2: Large Group Surcharge applies for groups between 16-20 participants (15% of total standard fee).

proposed_terms.proposal: Include $400 travel cost as separate line item.
proposed_terms.supporting_data_reference: Based on Section 3: Standard Travel Cost Estimate for TechCity is $400 covering travel time, mileage/flight, and 1 night accommodation.
